vote.title: Authorize a resolution to support Detailed Applications for funding for two planning projects: Project 1 -  Skillman Bridge Connectivity and Safe Routes to Schools Planning Study and Project 2 - Esperanza District Neighborhood Planning Study for the Texas Department of Transportation Call for Projects to utilize funds for cost reimbursement through the Transportation Alternatives Set-Aside Program - Financing: This action has no cost consideration to the City (see Fiscal Information for potential future costs)
vote.description: Authorize a resolution to support Detailed Applications for funding for two planning projects: Project 1 -  Skillman Bridge Connectivity and Safe Routes to Schools Planning Study and Project 2 - Esperanza District Neighborhood Planning Study for the Texas Department of Transportation Call for Projects to utilize funds for cost reimbursement through the Transportation Alternatives Set-Aside Program - Financing: This action has no cost consideration to the City (see Fiscal Information for potential future costs)
